statements: SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulations
SELECT species, population_size FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE location = 'Forest'
SELECT id, species, location FROM WildlifePopulations ORDER BY species ASC
SELECT species, SUM(population_size) AS total_population FROM WildlifePopulations GROUP BY species
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE impact_of_human_activities LIKE '%threatening%'
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT species, location FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE impact_of_human_activities = 'Low' ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT location, population_size FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE location LIKE 'Africa%' AND population_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT species, impact_of_human_activities FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE population_size < 500 OR impact_of_human_activities = 'High';
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE species IN ('Tiger', 'Elephant', 'Lion') ORDER BY location, species DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population;
SELECT species, population_size FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population ORDER BY species DESC;
SELECT species, habitat_type FROM wildlife_population WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM human_activities ORDER BY impact_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species DESC
SELECT species, SUM(population_size) AS total_population FROM wildlife_population GROUP BY species HAVING total_population > 5000
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population WHERE habitat_type IN ('forest', 'grassland') AND population_size < 500 ORDER BY habitat_type
SELECT species, population_size FROM wildlife_population WHERE species LIKE '%bear%' ORDER BY population_size DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM wildlife_population)
SELECT id, species, population_size FROM wildlife_population_data;
SELECT location, last_observation_date, species, population_size FROM wildlife_population_data;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population_data WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT location, impact_level, activity_type FROM human_activities;
SELECT id, location, pollution_level, biodiversity_score FROM ecosystem_health;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population_data WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species ASC, last_observation_date DESC;
SELECT id, species, population_size, location FROM wildlife_population_data WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest' AND population_size < 5000;
SELECT species, COUNT(*) AS count FROM wildlife_population_data GROUP BY species HAVING count > 3 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM human_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Logging' ORDER BY impact_level DESC, location ASC;
SELECT location, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution, MAX(biodiversity_score) AS max_biodiversity FROM ecosystem_health GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_pollution DESC, max_biodiversity DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population ORDER BY species_name ASC, population_count DESC
SELECT species_name, location FROM wildlife_population WHERE location='Forest'
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_count > 1000
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_population FROM wildlife_population GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_health WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_count > 1000 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT location, last_observed_date FROM wildlife_population WHERE last_observed_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM human_activities WHERE impact_on_population LIKE '%negative%';
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_health WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5 AND pollution_level = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_species;
SELECT species_name, scientific_name FROM wildlife_species;
SELECT * FROM observation_logs WHERE observation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM wildlife_species WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT observation_date, observer_name, location_name FROM observation_logs ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_species ORDER BY species_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT observation_date, location_name, species_name FROM observation_logs WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT scientific_name, habitat_type FROM wildlife_species WHERE population_count < 500 OR population_count > 5000;
SELECT observation_date, observer_name, location_name, species_name FROM observation_logs WHERE population_count BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_data WHERE average_temperature >= 25.0 AND average_precipitation < 100.0 ORDER BY average_temperature DESC, average_precipitation ASC LIMIT 5;
